text: Chithrathoonukal is a 2001 Indian Malayalam film, directed by TN Vasanth Kumar, starring Vijayaraghavan and Anju Aravind in the lead role. ==Cast== * Sangeetha as Sudha * George Cheriyan as Hedmond Peter * Anju Aravind as Indu * Anu Anand as Vinu Josepph * Augustine as Sundareshan * Bheeman Raghu as Captain Eeppan George * Bindu Varappuzha as Valsamma Joseph * Elias Babu as Dr. Unnikrishnan Nair * Jayanth as Sujith/Chinnan * KPAC Premachandran as Poojari/Balakrishnan's father * Kannur Sreelatha as Agnes * Machan Varghese as College Peon * Mala Aravindan as Neelalohithan * Kozhikode Narayanan Nair as Indu's father * Paravoor Bharathan as Principal * Priyanka as Saramma * Rudraprathap as Balakrishnan Namboothiri * Sadiq as Prabhakaran * Shaju as Kabir * Sindhu Jacob as Balakrishnan's sister * VK Sreeraman as IG * Vijayaraghavan as CI Sarathchandra Varma * Yadu Krishnan as Renjith * Sujatha (New) as Charutha * Prakash as Roy * Chali Pala as Kaimal ==References== ==External links== * Category:2001 films Category:Indian films Category:2000s Malayalam-language films
title: Chithrathoonukal
